subtopicsString: Introduction to Photosynthesis: Definition, overall equation, and significance, Anatomy of Photosynthesis: Chloroplast structure, pigments (chlorophyll a and b, carotenoids), and location of reactions, The Light-Dependent Reactions: Absorption spectra, photosystems I and II, electron transport chain, and photophosphorylation (cyclic and non-cyclic), The Light-Independent Reactions (The Calvin Cycle): Carbon fixation (RuBisCO), reduction, and regeneration of RuBP, Photorespiration and Alternative Pathways: C4 mechanism and Crassulacean Acid Metabolism (CAM), Factors Affecting Photosynthesis Rate: Light intensity, CO2 concentration, and temperature
